functions.name: Get Owners for Collection
functions.description: Retrieves the owners of all NFTs for a given collection.

args.name: Contract Address
args.description: The address of the NFT contract.

args.name: Blockchain Network
args.example: eth-mainnet, eth-goerli, polygon-mainnet, polygon-mumbai, arb-mainnet, arb-goerli, opt-mainnet, opt-goerli
args.description: The name of the blockchain network.

functions.name: Get Owners of NFTs by single TokenId
functions.description: Retrieves the owners of all NFTs from a given contract with a tokenId

args.name: Contract Address
args.description: The address of the NFT contract.

args.name: Blockchain Network
args.example: eth-mainnet, eth-goerli, polygon-mainnet, polygon-mumbai, arb-mainnet, arb-goerli, opt-mainnet, opt-goerli
args.description: The name of the blockchain network.

functions.name: Get Owners of NFTs Matching Trait
functions.description: Fetches the owners of all NFTs with a matching trait for the given contract and trait.

args.name: Contract Address
args.description: The address of the NFT contract.

args.name: Blockchain Network
args.example: eth-mainnet, eth-goerli, polygon-mainnet, polygon-mumbai, arb-mainnet, arb-goerli, opt-mainnet, opt-goerli
args.description: The name of the blockchain network.

args.name: Trait Type
args.description: The type of the trait to search for.

args.name: Trait Value
args.description: The value of the trait to search for.

functions.name: Get Owners by Token IDs
functions.description: Fetches owners of NFTs with a matching tokenids. This is for multiple TokenIds.

args.name: Contract Address
args.description: The address of the contract to query.

args.name: Blockchain Network
args.example: eth-mainnet, eth-goerli, polygon-mainnet, polygon-mumbai, arb-mainnet, arb-goerli, opt-mainnet, opt-goerli
args.description: The name of the blockchain network.
